languages.text: {n}Злоба ядовито смеется.{/n} "Ты же хотел{mf||а} моей помощи? А я помогаю Ревущим. И когда в мое логово приходит посланец друкари, они смирно идут на бойцовскую арену и пытаются там выжить. Так живут на шпилях".

traits.locale_text: {n}Злоба ядовито смеется.{/n} "Ты же хотел{mf||а} быть моим другом? Хотел{mf||а} моей помощи? А мои друзья, которым я помогаю — Ревущие. И когда в мое логово приходит посланец друкари, они смирно идут на бойцовскую арену и пытаются там выжить. Так живут на шпилях".

languages.text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."
languages.original_text: {n}Злоба ядовито смеется.{/n} "Ты же хотел{mf||а} моей помощи? А я помогаю Ревущим. И когда в мое логово приходит посланец друкари, они смирно идут на бойцовскую арену и пытаются там выжить. Так живут на шпилях".

traits.locale_text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

{n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

{n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

{n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

languages.text: {n}恶棍发出了恶毒的大笑声。{/n}“不是你想让我帮你吗，是吧？你看，我只会帮我的尖啸者。而且，只要黑暗灵族的信使来到我的巢穴，那些尖啸者就得老老实实地去竞技场，想办法活下来。尖塔里的生活就是这个样子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍发出了恶毒的大笑声。{/n}“不是你想让我帮你吗，是吧？你看，我只会帮我的尖啸者。而且，只要黑暗灵族的信使来到我的巢穴，那些尖啸者就得老老实实地去竞技场，想办法活下来。尖塔里的生活就是这个样子。”

languages.text: {n}Malicia suelta una risotada desagradable.{/n} «¿No querías mi ayuda? Pues yo ayudo a los Aulladores. Y cuando un mensajero Drukhari viene a mi guarida, se marchan a la arena tranquilamente e intentan sobrevivir. Así es la vida en las torres».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malicia suelta una risotada desagradable.{/n} «¿No querías mi ayuda? Pues yo ayudo a los Aulladores. Y cuando un mensajero Drukhari viene a mi guarida, se marchan a la arena tranquilamente e intentan sobrevivir. Así es la vida en las torres».

languages.text: {n}マリスは意地悪そうに笑う。{/n}「私に助けを求めたのは貴様だろう？私はシュリーカーを助ける。そして、デュカーリの使者が私の巣穴にやってきたら、彼らは静かに闘技場へ行き、生き延びようとする。それが尖塔での生活だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスは意地悪そうに笑う。{/n}「私に助けを求めたのは貴様だろう？私はシュリーカーを助ける。そして、デュカーリの使者が私の巣穴にやってきたら、彼らは静かに闘技場へ行き、生き延びようとする。それが尖塔での生活だ」

languages.text: {n}Tücke lacht boshaft auf.{/n} "Ihr wolltet meine Hilfe, nicht wahr? Nun, ich helfe Kreischern. Und wenn ein Bote der Drukhari in mein Versteck kommt, dann geht er schön brav und still in die Arena und versucht zu überleben. So ist das Leben in den Türmen."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tücke lacht boshaft auf.{/n} "Ihr wolltet meine Hilfe, nicht wahr? Nun, ich helfe Kreischern. Und wenn ein Bote der Drukhari in mein Versteck kommt, dann geht er schön brav und still in die Arena und versucht zu überleben. So ist das Leben in den Türmen."

languages.text: {n}Démon éclate d'un rire cruel.{/n} « Vous vouliez mon aide, non ? Eh bien, j'aide les Hurleurs. Et quand {mf|un messager|une messagère} des Drukharis pénètre dans mon antre, {mf|il|elle} part pour l'arène bien gentiment et {mf|il|elle} fait tout pour y survivre. C'est ça, la vie dans les tours. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Démon éclate d'un rire cruel.{/n} « Vous vouliez mon aide, non ? Eh bien, j'aide les Hurleurs. Et quand {mf|un messager|une messagère} des Drukharis pénètre dans mon antre, {mf|il|elle} part pour l'arène bien gentiment et {mf|il|elle} fait tout pour y survivre. C'est ça, la vie dans les tours. »

languages.text: {n}Melanet pis pis gülüyor.{/n} "Yardımımı istedin, değil mi? Ben yalnızca Çığırtkanlara yardım ederim. İnime bir Drukhari elçisi gelirse o da efendi efendi arenaya gidip hayatta kalmaya çalışır. Kulelerde işler böyle yürür."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice laughs nastily.{/n} "You wanted my help, didn't you? Well, I help Shriekers. And when a Drukhari messenger comes to my den, they go off to the arena nice and quietly, and they try to survive. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Melanet pis pis gülüyor.{/n} "Yardımımı istedin, değil mi? Ben yalnızca Çığırtkanlara yardım ederim. İnime bir Drukhari elçisi gelirse o da efendi efendi arenaya gidip hayatta kalmaya çalışır. Kulelerde işler böyle yürür."
